name: Baked Chicken with Herbs
short_description: Juicy baked chicken infused with the flavors of rosemary, thyme, and lemon.
long_description: Baked Chicken with Herbs is a succulent and aromatic dish featuring chicken seasoned with a blend of rosemary, thyme, and fresh lemon. The result is a golden-brown, flavorful masterpiece.
instructions: Rub chicken with olive oil, garlic, rosemary, thyme, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Bake until chicken is cooked through and golden brown.
